es.csic.iiia.bms.factors
Class SingleWeightFactor<T>

java.lang.Object
  es.csic.iiia.bms.factors.ProxyFactor<T>
      es.csic.iiia.bms.factors.SingleWeightFactor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the factor's identity.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Factor<T>
public class SingleWeightFactor<T>
extends ProxyFactor<T>

Factor that composes (sums) an independent cost/utility for each neighbor with some other inner (non-independent) factor.

The resulting complexity is the same as that of the inner factor.

Author:
Toni Penya-Alba

          Build a new weighting factor with the specified inner factor.
